## Create Connect API

-   login

-   go to your username

-   create key

-   add to environment var

```{r}
library(dplyr)

library(vetiver)
library(pins)
library(tidymodels)
library(plumber)
```

```{r}

car_mod <-
    workflow(mpg ~ ., decision_tree(mode = "regression")) %>%
    fit(mtcars)
v <- vetiver_model(car_mod, "cars_mpg")
model_board <- board_folder("pins-r", versioned = TRUE)
model_board %>% vetiver_pin_write(v)
```
